title: Bug: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed as expected.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed.
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open a binary project in the IDE. 
2. Select a file or element within the binary project.
3. Press the F4 key to open the scoped type hierarchy. The hierarchy should not be displayed.
